root.name: Championship Manager: Season 01/02
root.description: Championship manager is the best football management sim in the world to date. The game is so popular that data updates are still being made today. It was brought to you by the makers of current Football management sim “Football Manager”. It has also been know to strain relationships between married or now divorced couples. Features- Details on your saved game, for example time played, leagues running and comments. An example of these comments includes, “that smell is your tea burning”.
